body: What a sad story, I don’t think the son would be mentally “ok” which is more sad xD there’s other story but the final is more in the incest way.

Thats goin to the faves. I remember that there's a similar scenario in dororo (2019 anime) demonstrating just that... To which lenghts a mother is capable of goin to raise and better care for her children. Sad reality check.

His dad left them as written in page 5. Being single mom might be hard for his mother thus resulting for her to have no choice but work on a dubious job such as porn. She's a good mom and no one can really blame her unless she abandoned his son which she did not. Last guy tried to bait her to just stop babysitting cause it was a waste for her. But she stay strong and said that she wants to be with her son. Overall, this is just another tragic story representing how life isn't fair. I'm just glad she isn't like those other sluts who gave up after experiencing pleasure and drowning in lust like most ntr out there..

@tobajas yeah. I felt irritated. usually with this types of stories I either fap to it or being angry but in this story I felt unanswered. obviously it is implied she did it previously and she's a good mom to single handedly take care of her son. and the last panel show a tragic yet beautiful mother and son bonding. I doubt her husband maybe left her because she found out about it.

10 out of 10 would cry again ☆

-Aimiee Lewd Lemieux

So from what I understood the mom was a pornstar, it's unclear if she did it for money because of the dad being a shit and/or the dad left because of it, it's kinda implied the dad is a shit in my book but it's also fairly clear that the mom cheated on him, she then continued after being left alone to support her son on her own. Eventually however she wanted to stop and focus on raising her son with a normal job, porn ppl didn't wanna let her leave and followed her home and then raped/forced her to have sex for more porn. Then from my understanding to get away from it she moved them away from where they were living to get away from it. Then some years later the son starts finding her porn and starts understanding what his mom has been doing for the last 5-10 years by my estimate. He jerks of to them, feels bad about it and we the readers are left in the dark if the mom is still doing porn or has gotten out of it like she seemed to want and we also have no idea what the son will do.
I understand  why MC's father gone missing because he is not cuck like mc.
This hentai is SO DEEP and EMOTIONAL
A story with an unbreakable bond between mother and son. She never mind break her self and she got out of been a porn star
I've stumbled upon several similar mangas. Such a shame because the drawing style is pretty gorgeous.
It's not NTR, but it's sad.
So why is it ntr? If her husband left her for another woman isn't she free now?
i have seen the animated version of this
I read a manga with the same plot, I unfortunenately forgot the title and the artist... the mother and son end up having an affair...

Damn, a pretty real story and not over-exaggerated. The mother actually didn't mind-break and basically is still a mother. She overcome that time and lives a normal life now (or well, i hope so, because page 3 can be interpreted as she is still doing it). Was definitely interesting for a one time read, but there is better stuff to fap to.
Is sad. But it's reality. This shit does happen.
Reading ntr and shit like this makes me understand why there are feminists around the worldlol
